page.title: 06OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
My mum works in Briggs which is a shoe shop in Stowmarket. She sells shoes and measures peoples feet. She wears a blue and white striped skirt and a white blouse in summer. In winter she wears a grey skirt and a white blouse.
My dad works in Rumbelows which is an electric shop in Mildenhall. He sells fridges, televisions and ovens. Sometimes he has to unload the delivery van and sometimes he has to go to someones house to mend something. He wears trousers a shirt and a jumper with Rumbelows on it.
